text: Ivan Boboshko was a Soviet football player and coach. He played for eight seasons in Shakhtar Donetsk. In 1956 Boboshko played couple of games for the Ukraine at the Spartakiad of the Peoples of the USSR and scoring one goal.Football at the 1956 Spartakiad of the Peoples of USSR On December 3, 2012 Boboshko died at the age of 83.Passed away: Ivan Boboshko. title: Ivan Boboshko
